00086   struct ClassPoint
00087   {
00088       const char *id;
00089       // Specialization points to match, in order: Stealth, Combat, Magic
00090       // Note: Order is taken from http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Morrowind:Class_Quiz
00091       unsigned int points[3];
00092   };

00114 
00115     GuiMode getMode() const
00116     {
00117         if (mGuiModes.empty())
00118             throw std::runtime_error ("getMode() called, but there is no active mode");
00119         return mGuiModes.back();
00120     }
00121 
00122     bool isGuiMode() const { return !mGuiModes.empty(); }
00123 
00124     void toggleVisible(GuiWindow wnd)
00125     {
00126         shown = (shown & wnd) ? (GuiWindow) (shown & ~wnd) : (GuiWindow) (shown | wnd);
00127         updateVisible();
00128     }
00129 
00130     // Disallow all inventory mode windows
00131     void disallowAll()
00132     {
00133       allowed = GW_None;
00134       updateVisible();
00135     }
00136 
00137     // Allow one or more windows
00138     void allow(GuiWindow wnd)
00139     {
00140       allowed = (GuiWindow)(allowed | wnd);
00141       updateVisible();
00142     }
00143 
00144     bool isAllowed(GuiWindow wnd) const
00145     {
00146         return allowed & wnd;
00147     }
00148

00310   template<typename T>
00311   void WindowManager::removeDialog(T*& dialog)
00312   {
00313       OEngine::GUI::Layout *d = static_cast<OEngine::GUI::Layout*>(dialog);
00314       removeDialog(d);
00315       dialog = 0;
00316   }
